fr.sii.ogham.core.util.bean

Class ReadMethodAccessor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.util.bean.ReadMethodAccessor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Accessor<T>

    public class ReadMethodAccessor<T>
extends Object
implements Accessor<T>
    Access object property using reflection
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadMethodAccessor

        public ReadMethodAccessor(Object bean,
                          String name)
        Initialize the accessor with the provided bean and property name.

        The read Method is searched by reflection and using the property name.

        If no read method defined for the property, the FieldAccessor is used.

        Parameters:
        bean - the bean that will be accessed
        name - the name of the property to access

      • ReadMethodAccessor

        public ReadMethodAccessor(Object bean,
                          String name,
                          Method readMethod)
        Initialize the accessor with the provided bean and property name.

        The read Method is directly provided in order to avoid reflection scanning.

        If no read method defined for the property, the FieldAccessor is used.

        Parameters:
        bean - the bean that will be accessed
        name - the name of the property to access
        readMethod - the getter method obtained through reflection that is used to access the property

      • ReadMethodAccessor

        public ReadMethodAccessor(Object bean,
                          String name,
                          Method readMethod,
                          Accessor<T> defaultAccessor)
        Initialize the accessor with the provided bean and property name.

        The read Method is directly provided in order to avoid reflection scanning.

        If no read method defined for the property, the defaultAccessor parameter is used.

        Parameters:
        bean - the bean that will be accessed
        name - the name of the property to access
        readMethod - the getter method obtained through reflection that is used to access the property. May be null if no read method (no getter) exists in the bean class but the property exists
        defaultAccessor - the default accessor if read method is null. May be null if only read method is used

        Description copied from interface: Accessor
        Get the value of the associated property
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface Accessor<T>
        Returns:
        the property value
